abstract: Forest Laboratories defeated Carl C. Icahn in a closely watched proxy fight, as shareholders on Thursday elected all 10 of the drug maker’s board nominees.
snippet: Forest Laboratories defeated Carl C. Icahn in a closely watched proxy fight, as shareholders on Thursday elected all 10 of the drug maker’s board nominees.
lead_paragraph: Forest Laboratories defeated Carl C. Icahn in a closely watched proxy fight, as shareholders on Thursday elected all 10 of the drug maker’s board nominees.

headline.main: Forest Labs Defeats Icahn in Proxy Fight

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
